Lately I have really lost sight of who and what I am, what I enjoy, and what I am interested in. I had been so completely wrapped up in another person's life that I forgot all of me. I had been trying so hard to "be a part" of his life and what is going on in it, that I had been neglecting myself. I don't really know what I want to do, or really what I want now out of this situation, but I know that it really can't go on the way that it has been. I think I am in the beginning stages of getting out of the rut. I usually just go crazy with wanting to know what he is doing, or what he is thinking, or what he is planning, or what he, he, he, he... right now, I am feeling so many things. Anger, hurt, resentment, spring to mind first. Then dissapointment, in both myself and the expectations that I had put upon him and our relationship. I thought that we were both caring people, now I think he doesn't know how to care. I'm sure that the feelings that he thinks he portrays are the reflections of emotions that he thinks are appropriate, but really, they are empty. My heart and mind and soul are divided equally at this time, I feel pulled in his direction, but equally pushed away. I don't know what is the right choice, I think I am going to see how things play out and play it cool for a while... give him the chance to do something. I will try not to set him up to fail.
